text: Khogno Khan National Park () is centered on Khogno Khan Mountain, about 60 km east of Kharakoram. The park features many historical sites, including the ruins of a 17th-century monastery. It is located in Gurvanbulag District of Bulgan Province, about 240 km west of Ulaanbaatar. ==See also== * List of national parks of Mongolia ==References== ==External links== * Park borders, Khugnu-Tarna National Park, ProtectedPlanet.net Category:National parks of Mongolia
title: Khogno Khan National Park
